policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:HttpBasic>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:HttpBasic>
        <L7p:Authentication>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:IdentityProviderOid goidValue="46550c0e4ebd96b5ec224769dafcb035"/>
        </L7p:Authentication>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="eyJlbnRpdHlfaWQiOiJsaWdodC5vZmZpY2Vfc3BvdCJ9"/>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="Mine"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
            <L7p:HttpMethod httpMethod="POST"/>
            <L7p:OmitAuthHeaderConnectReuseSystemDefault boxedBooleanValue="true"/>
            <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="http://192.168.1.144:8123/api/services/homeassistant/turn_off"/>
            <L7p:ProxyPassword stringValueNull="null"/>
            <L7p:ProxyUsername stringValueNull="null"/>
            <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:CustomizeValue stringValue="Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiI3NTU0MzUxMDVjZWI0YmJiYTI2OTEyZmFmOTQwNDk1ZiIsImlhdCI6MTY2NTA2NDY5MywiZXhwIjoxOTgwNDI0NjkzfQ.a_4A4H2P40eCCnOhEw-lSPwTkfLmElp-nZOesO2hVZ8"/>
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="Authorization"/>
                        <L7p:UsesCustomizedValue booleanValue="true"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Rules>
            </L7p:RequestHeaderRules>
            <L7p:RequestMsgSrc stringValue="Mine"/>
            <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
            </L7p:RequestParamRules>
            <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Rules>
            </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules>
            <L7p:SamlAssertionVersion intValue="2"/>
        </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
        <L7p:EncodeDecode>
            <L7p:CharacterEncoding stringValue="UTF-16"/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="mine"/>
            <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
            <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="out"/>
            <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
        </L7p:EncodeDecode>
        <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
            <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="PGE+JHtvdXR9PC9hPg=="/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
